name: The Odyssey of Millas
description:
THE ODYSSEY OF MILAS 

Team Zeus é Fiel

Made for the first Univali Xamk Game Jam!! 

Authorial Art by João Henrique 

Programing made in GameMaker Studio 2 

Authorial Audio by João Paulo 

João Seixas Durante Farias Lima, João Henrique Zimmermann Rohde, João Paulo de Pinho Althoff  e Victor Gabriel Borges Boff  present: The Odyssey of Milas 

The Odyssey of Milas is a game set in the old greece, living in the Greek Mythology thematic. Milas is a greek citizen that has an incredible abilitie to assemble and disassemble things. One day he disassembled the goddess Hera's statue which made the goddess fall in love with the mortal, since her marriage with Zeus wasn't going very well. And then came Zeus! In anger he decided that he would strike Milas down with the lightning judgement. Milas will have to use his assembling skills blessed by Hera to protect himself of the rage of the gods.

font credit: Cumberland Fontworks 

Document prototype of the game: https://docs.google.com/document/d/16tyeyoDem9ElY7bEOLvf1YjQe2n51k1Rh6wPWM39vpY/...
